Story_Climate_Global_StoryInfo: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and the only object in the Universe known to harbor life. According to radiometric dating and other sources of evidence, Earth formed over 4.5 billion years ago.
Story_Climate_Global_Info: Explore the data visualization of our climate on our planet in the last years.
Story_Climate_Arctic_StoryInfo: Explore the important Arctic region of our planet.
Story_Climate_Arctic_Info: This region is very important for our planet.
Story_Climate_Polarstern_StoryInfo: The boat that did the measurements.
Story_Climate_Polarstern_Info: Follow us on a mission to explore the changing climate in the important Arctic region of our planet
